note.locale: XML Schema 1.1 Part 2: Datatypes in Ample SDK is currently in development.
Реализация XML Schema 1.1 Part 2: Datatypes в Ample SDK находится в разработке.

abstract.locale: "XML Schema 1.1 Part 2: Datatypes" defines facilities for defining datatypes to be used in XML Schemas as well as other XML specifications. The datatype language, which is itself represented in XML 1.0, provides a superset of the capabilities found in XML 1.0 document type definitions (DTDs) for specifying datatypes on elements and attributes.

content.locale: XML Schema 1.1 defines a namespaces associated with the URI http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema.
Пространство имен XML Schema 1.1 определяется URI http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema
At the present moment "XML Schema 1.1 Part 2: Datatypes" in Ample SDK is in the development.
В настоящее время реализация языка "XML Schema 1.1 Part 2: Datatypes" в Ample SDK находится в стадии разработки.
